question: 電車
sourceMnemonic: You would think that an <kanji>electricity</kanji> <kanji>car</kanji> was an electric car, but this word was made before the days of the Prius. This refers to a <vocabulary>train</vocabulary>, which I guess was electric at some point.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
